Class Footer

extends java.lang.Object

      Keyword replaced by the total number of pages in the document.
      static java.lang.String PAGENUM
      Keyword replaced by the current page number. if COUNT_FIRSTPAGE is false, the first page will be number zero, otherwise 1.

      Keyword replaced by name of the currently logged in user.

    • Field Detail

      • PAGENUM

        public static final java.lang.String PAGENUM
        Keyword replaced by the current page number. if COUNT_FIRSTPAGE is false, the first page will be number zero, otherwise 1.
        See Also:
        setCOUNT_FIRSTPAGE(boolean), Constant Field Values

      • DATE

        public static final java.lang.String DATE
        Keyword replaced by the current date. Format is fixed to "dd MMM yyyy"
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • USER

        public static final java.lang.String USER
        Keyword replaced by name of the currently logged in user.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NUMPAGES

        public static final java.lang.String NUMPAGES
        Keyword replaced by the total number of pages in the document. If COUNT_FIRSTPAGE is false, the front page is omittet from the count.
        See Also:
        setCOUNT_FIRSTPAGE(boolean), Constant Field Values

      • defaultFooter

        public static Footer defaultFooter
        Convenience function for returning a default footer style. The default footer typesets the footer in gray TIMES_BOLD, sz 8. The left part of the text is todays date, center is username, and the right part is PAGENUM of NUMPAGES

    • Constructor Detail

      • Footer

        public Footer()
        Sole constructor. Return a footer in gray TIMES_BOLD, sz 8. The left part of the text is todays date, center is username, and the right part is PAGENUM of NUMPAGES

    • Method Detail

      • getTextColor

        public java.awt.Color getTextColor()
        Gets currently selected text color for the footer.
        Returns:
        color, default is java.awt.Color.gray

        Set the color to use for footer text.

      • isOMIT_FIRSTPAGE

        public boolean isOMIT_FIRSTPAGE()
        Tells whether the first page should have footer or not.
        Returns:
        true or false, default is true

      • setOMIT_FIRSTPAGE

        public void setOMIT_FIRSTPAGE(boolean OMIT_FIRSTPAGE)
        Set this flag to false to include footer also on first page
        Parameters:
        OMIT_FIRSTPAGE - true or false

      • isCOUNT_FIRSTPAGE

        public boolean isCOUNT_FIRSTPAGE()
        Tells whether the first page is included in total page count or not.
        Returns:
        true or false, default is true
        See Also:
        PAGENUM, NUMPAGES

      • setCOUNT_FIRSTPAGE

        public void setCOUNT_FIRSTPAGE(boolean COUNT_FIRSTPAGE)
        Set this flag to false to omit the first page from total page count.
        Parameters:
        COUNT_FIRSTPAGE - true or false
        See Also:
        PAGENUM, NUMPAGES

        public org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDFont getFont()
